Package view_controller

package view_controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    LoginPane
    Sets the functionality of the account changing buttons in WordleGUI
    WordleAccount
    Stores account information for users of the Wordle app.
    WordleConsole
    Stores information and methods required to run the game Wordle in a console.
    WordleGUI
    Wordle GUI to show the Wordle game on the screen board.
